item.title: New To Design
item.description: Following my learning design post, I’ve started a little project called “new to design.” At the moment it just consists of a learn-design tag on my Pinboard bookmarks and a Twitter account @newtodesign so that I can share useful design resources (especially for those new to design.) In the future, I hope it can be useful in other ways. Any suggestions or anything you want to see? You know how to get in touch…
